title: Maruzas
text: Maruzas was a 6th-century <a href="Iranian%20peoples">Iranian</a> commander active during the reign of the <a href="Sasanian">Sasanian</a> king (<a href="shah">shah</a>) <a href="Hormizd%20IV">Hormizd IV</a> (). He was defeated and killed by a <a href="Byzantine%20Empire">Byzantine</a> army led by Germanus at the <a href="Battle%20of%20Martyropolis%20%28588%29">battle of Martyrpolis</a>.
